Title.ui:help: The title of your data package

Description.ui:help: A description of your data package

Title_document.ui:help: Title of document which contains human readable information containing details of the dataset

Link_document.ui:help: Link or location of the document which contains human readable information containing details of the dataset

Topic_Category.ui:description: A high-level classification scheme to assist in the grouping and topic-based search of available spatial data resources.

Work_Package.ui:help: The work package this dataset belongs to within the Delta Enigma project

Version.ui:help: The version indicator (name or identifier) of the dataset

Language.ui:help: The language of the data package

Temporal_Coverage.ui:title: Temporal coverage
Temporal_Coverage.ui:description: A temporal period that covers the Dataset (Series)

Start_Date.ui:help: Indicate the start date of the temporal coverage of the data

End_Date.ui:help: Indicate the end date of the temporal coverage of the data

Geographical_Coverage.ui:description: Geographical location refers to a specific physical point on Earth. This is more precise than 'area' or 'place' often defined by a set of latitude and longitude coordinates.

Reference_System.ui:help: The coordinate reference system used for the geographical coordinates

Expedition.ui:description: An unique code or designation to refer to either an organised trip or mission to explore a particular phenomenon or a collection of other measurements.

Acquisition_Sensor.ui:description: Measuring instrument which gathers and process essential data which describes physical phenomena.

Keyword.ui:description: Free text field for adding (searchable) keywords to your data package

Persistent_Identifier.ui:help: Persistent identifier of the related resource

Identifier_Scheme.ui:help: Type of Persistent identifier of the related resource

Identifier.ui:help: The identifier as it can be resolved on the appropriate service

Funder_Name.ui:help: The name(s) of the organisation(s) funding the research. E.g. NWO

Award_Number.ui:help: The award or grant number issued by the funding organisation

Award_Name.ui:help: The award or grant name issued by the funding organisation

Creation_Date.ui:help: The date on which the Dataset has been first created

Release_Date.ui:help: The date on which the Dataset has been released

Applicable_Legislation.ui:help: The legislation that mandates the creation or management of the Dataset

Resource_Type.ui:help: What is the type of your data

Creator.ui:description: The person(s) who created (a version of) the data package.

Given_Name.ui:help: The personal or first name of the person(s) who created (a version of) the data package

Family_Name.ui:help: The surname or last name of the person(s) who created (a version of) the data package

Person_Identifier.ui:description: Person identifier of creator of the data package

Name_Identifier_Scheme.ui:help: What type of person identifier is used? (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, or ScopusID)

Name_Identifier.ui:help: Identifier as it can be resolved on the appropriate service

Contributor.ui:description: The person(s) who have contributed to this data package

Name.ui:help: The name(s) of the persons who have contributed to this data package

Given_Name.ui:help: The personal or first name of the person(s) who has contributed to (a version of) the data package

Family_Name.ui:help: The surname or last name of the person(s) who has contributed to (a version of) the data package

Type.ui:help: The type of contributor. List of values is derived from DataCite

URL.ui:help: The contact page of the contributor

Person_Identifier.ui:description: Person identifier of contributor of the data package

Name_Identifier_Scheme.ui:help: What type of person identifier is used? (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, or ScopusID)

Name_Identifier.ui:help: Identifier as it can be resolved on the appropriate service

Contact_Point.ui:description: The person(s) who act as point of contact for this data package

Given_Name.ui:help: The personal or first name of the person(s) who has contributed to (a version of) the data package

Family_Name.ui:help: The surname or last name of the person(s) who has contributed to (a version of) the data package

Position.ui:help: The position the contact person holds within the organization

Email.ui:help: The e-mail of the contact person

Person_Identifier.ui:description: Person identifier of contributor of the data package

Name_Identifier_Scheme.ui:help: What type of person identifier is used? (e.g. an ORCID, DAI, or ScopusID)

Name_Identifier.ui:help: Identifier as it can be resolved on the appropriate service

License_Document.ui:help: The license document containing the terms of use of the dataset.

Access_Rights.ui:help: Information regarding access to the dataset or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies.

Rights.ui:help: A statement that specifies rights associated with the distribution of the Dataset.

Domain.ui:description: The primary domain or field of study for this dataset
